q: Phone 7, said while sales were certainly a measure of the platform's success, customer satisfaction and developer investment were more important leading indicators. And to that end, the company has been pleased. 93 percent of Windows Phone customers are satisfied or very satisfied with Windows Phone 7, and 90 percent would recommend the phone to others, Greg Sullivan said. It's good because without that I wouldn't see it or I wouldn't know, so that gives me guidance, areas to work on. Michael Vick admitted that he tried too often to make a big play last season. a "great boss". The presenter, who took over as host of The X Factor in 2007, told Absolute Radio's Christian O'Connell that he had been taught a lot by Simon Cowell . He's a workaholic. He's a great boss, and I'm not just saying that, he said. "He's very loyal, he's very honest, and he just wants that in return." He continued: "He smells fear though, he's like a wolf.
